import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import avatar from "../assets/profile.png" import {Toaster} from "react-hot-toast" import {useFormik} from "formik" import {passwordValidate } from '../helper/validate' import styles from '../styles/Username.module.css'; export default function Register() { const formik=useFormik({ initialValues: { email:"nalawadevishwas96@gmail.com", username:"Vishwas Nalawade", password:"Vishwas777@" }, validate:passwordValidate, validateOnBlur:false, validateOnChange:false, onSubmit:async values=> { console.log(values); } }) return (
